/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, hinting at the city's architectural style. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
